hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"Umar had made a vow to spend a night in 'Itikaf in Al-Masjid Al-Haram. He asked the Messenger of Allah about that, and he ordered him to perform the 'Itikaf

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا نَذَرَ ثُمَّ أَسْلَمَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَفِيَ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Makes A Vow Then Becomes Muslim Before Fulfilling It
